full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,NYI ZLA BA GZA' SKAR GYIS KHRUS KYIS BZHUGS MCHOG ZHES BYA BA'I BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(MJUG TU YUL LHA GZHI BDAG BSANGS BZHAG ,SNANG BRGYAD 'DON, NYI ZLA GZA' SKAR KHUS MCHOG GTZANG BA'I CHU RGYUN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SLOB DPON NA G'A 'DZU NA'I MDZAD SROL ZHES GRAGS PA LA GZHIR BYAS, SNANG BRGYAD NAS KHA BSKANG @007B BYAS NAS BZUNG BRGYAN TE, DAD DANG BSKAL MNYAM THAMS CAD KYIS BYED BDE BA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG RANG GI LHAG BSAM GYIS BSKUL BA TE, THA SHAL BLO ZHES MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PAS DMIGS YUL SEMS CAN RNAMS LA BKRA SHIS DANG PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,aiTHI: BDE LEGS SU GYUR CIG ,)
